name: KND - Codename: Kids next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.
name_original: KND - Codename: Kids next Door - Operation: V.I.D.E.O.G.A.M.E.
description: Play with your favorite agent of the Kids Next Door and explore 14 different levels - each environment has its own style. Use the different skills of the Kids Next Door members as you fight, jump, swim, crouch and dive through the missions. Take on exciting battles against Stickybeard, Knightbrace, the Toiletnator and other evil and crazy enemies from the show.
